title: VanEck predicts Ethereum Layer-2’s collective market cap will climb to $1 trillion by 2030
description:
VanEck believes that Ethereum‘s Layer-2 protocols will hit a collective $1 trillion market capitalization by 2030, according to a new research report published on April 3. The prediction was revealed in a detailed analysis led by VanEck senior investment analyst Patrick Bush and head of digital research Matthew Sigel. VanEck’s forecast of a $1 trillion […]

The post VanEck predicts Ethereum Layer-2’s collective market cap will climb to $1 trillion by 2030 appeared first on CryptoSlate.
